name: Texas Whiskey Revival
description: This cocktail is made with Balcones True Blue Whiskey, a Texan blue corn whiskey, balanced with fresh lemon.
recipeIngredient: Garnish: candied orange peel, maraschino cherry

recipeInstructions.text: Add all ingredients to cocktail shaker. Fill with ice and shake for 15 seconds. Strain into an old fashioned glass filled with ice. Garnish with candied orange peel and a cherry and serve.
